Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub! ‚ù§Ô∏è

To get length of a string, use len(str) method it will count and return numbers of element of string.

In golang the len() method used for counts element of string.

Let‚Äôs start

package main
import "fmt"

func main() {
  str := "aGuideHub"
	fmt.Println("Length of str", len(str))
}

In the above program, we are accessing length of string, let‚Äôs see the output.

Output:

Length of str 9

Try it yourself
